mapper.select: SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(CAFEINFO C, OWNER_GOODSREG O, REVIEW R) */ C.CAFE_IDX, C.CAFE_NAME,C.CAFE_LOCATION, I.CP_STORED_FILE_NAME, O.GOODSREG_OPTIONNAME, O.GOODSREG_PRICE, count(R.V_star) B, avg(R.V_star) A from CAFEINFO C left join OWNER_GOODSREG O ON C.CAFE_IDX = O.GOODSREG_CAFE_IDX left join REVIEW R ON O.GOODSREG_CAFE_IDX = R.V_C_IDX left join cafephoto I on I.cp_board_idx = c.cafe_idx where I.cp_board_type='cafeInfo' group by C.CAFE_IDX, C.CAFE_NAME,C.CAFE_LOCATION, O.GOODSREG_OPTIONNAME, O.GOODSREG_PRICE, I.CP_STORED_FILE_NAME
mapper.insert: insert into MEMBERS(m_id, m_name, m_email, m_pw, m_cellphone, m_type , m_own_num) values (#{m_id}, #{m_name}, #{m_email}, #{m_pw}, ${m_cellphone}, ${m_type} , ${m_own_num})
mapper.select: select m_id, m_pw, m_name, m_type from MEMBERS where m_id = #{m_id}
